title: Fort Larned National Historic Site: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           1767 KS Hwy 156  Larned, KS 67550                 Directions         Fort Larned National Historic Site is located on KS Hwy 156, six miles west of Larned, KS.  Directions Details           Operating Hours & Seasons         Visitor Center Museum exhibits, a 10 minute AV program and ranger programs are all available in the Visitor Center.   Standard Hours    Sunday: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM   Monday: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM   Tuesday: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM   Wednesday: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM   Thursday: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM   Friday: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM   Saturday: 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM      Additional Information View More       Christmas Day:   -       New Year’s Day:   -       Thanksgiving Day:   -                  Weather           Western Kansas has a four season climate with hot summers and relatively low humidity. Although winters tend to be cold, with average daytime highs in the 30s and 40s, Chinook winds in the winter can warm western Kansas all the way into the 80F (27C) range.          Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Free Admission - $0.00 No charge for any of the park's activities.         Visitor Centers       Fort Larned Visitor Center Located in one of the two historic enlisted barracks, the park visitor center provides orientation to the grounds, a 10 minute AV program, and museum exhibits.                              Operating Hours & Seasons               Fees & Passes               Permits & Reservations               Weather               Pets               Frequently Asked Questions.
